creator: ducnvloved@gmail.com
text:
When I click on Undeploy an application from the applications list. I get the message "OK/ undeployed... " but the application is still in the list with the status "false" . 
I cannot start/stop/undeploy anymore. 

Can some one help me with this please?

creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text: Bugzilla is not a support forum.

(In reply to comment #1)
> Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Hi. 

I know this not a support forum. 
Just want to report a bug and if someone had this issue before can tell me how to solve it. That's it.
creator: ducnvloved@gmail.com

text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> (In reply to comment #1)
> 
> I know this not a support forum. 

Then stop trying to use it as such.  If you have an issue to discuss, bring it up on the users mailing list, not bugzilla.
creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
